name: 譚巽言
objective:
To familiarize the student with an overview of the object-oriented programming (OOP) paradigm and advanced techniques of the C++ language. Topics include:
1. C++ Object Model
2. Classes and Objects
3. Constructors and Destructors
4. Inheritance
5. Virtual Functions and Polymorphism
6. Operator Overloading
7. Exceptions
8. Generic Programming
9. Standard Template Library
10. Term Project
schedule:
1. C++程式基本指令介紹
(1) Flow Control
(2) Functions
(3) Arrays
(4) Pointers and Strings
2. Classes
3. Operator Overloading
4. Inheritance
5. Virtual Functions
6. Template
7. Files
8. Case Studies
scorePolicy:
Middle term examination： 30 %
Final term examination： 20 %
Assignments： 50 %
materials:
Text Book:
C++ How To Program Global Ed. 10th Ed. By Paul Deitel and Harvey, 2017
Published by Pearson Education
